metadata.title: CVE-2023-40546 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Shim when an error happened while creating a new ESLvariable. If Shim fails to create the new variable, it tries to print anerror message to the user; however, the number of parameters used by thelogging function doesn't match the format string used by it, leading to acrash under certain circumstances.

criterions.comment: secureboot-db: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
shim-signed: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
shim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
